English: to send, to curse, to begin
take care of, roast, to rob
a k. of cherry tree, to string on, report
a part of a grapes cluster
half the length of the thumb
shake lightly, to spill, to dip
to fall, unclose, to make thin
to pass over with the hand
to be hungry, to send, to leave
three, to pass over with the hand
to pass over with the hand
to make fire, squeeze, to lie
